Attribute.name: 4HStandard_EventCurrency
Attribute.value: #program; var baseReward = toDouble(System::getConfigValue('__MoesArk_BalanceConfig:Jobs:4HStandard_EventCurrency__')); var bonusReward = 0; var building = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('SpringfieldZooEntrance')); if(!isNULL(building)) { bonusReward = ceil(baseReward * (toDouble(Building::getArrangeBonus(building)) / 100)); } return baseReward + bonusReward;
